channel.title: Overview on OSSTD doc
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on OSSTD doc

item.title: Limitations
item.description: Some features of 90.1-2019 Appendix G that have not yet been implemenented into the baseline automation are as follows: Baseline humidification is same as user model in the current tool. In some cases the baseline is required to be changed to adiabatic humidification. This has not been implemented. Baseline dehumidification is same as user model in the current tool. For constant volume systems, Appendix G indicates that only 25% of the system reheat energy shall be included in the budget building performance.
